titles.title: California Milk Marketing Order Act
A bill to provide for the inclusion of the State of California as a separate Federal milk marketing order upon the petition and approval of California dairy producers of such inclusion.
California Milk Marketing Order Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
California Milk Marketing Order Act - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA), upon the petition and approval of California dairy producers, to designate California as a separate federal milk marketing order.
Provides that if so designated, the order covering California shall have the right to reblend and distribute order receipts to recognize quota value.
